name: Christmas Inc.
description:
We need your help! People are losing their Christmas Spirit! The elves need a leader and you're just right for the job!

Build up stations and assign elves to them to get them producing resources, send those resources to the Toy Shop and boom! We're back in business!

Christmas Inc. is a Christmas themed Tycoon game where elves need your expert managing skills to streamline the toy making process in Santa's Workshop! 

This game was entirely made from scratch in 5 days by an awesome team of multi-talented designers, artists and sound engineers!

Meet the Team: Designers/Programmers: Austin Bishop Cutler Cannon Jason Kearl Jacob Coles 3D/Environment Artist: Steven Moreno 2D UI/Concept Artist: Emma Eastlake (Tensei) Sound Designers: Royalty Ty1176 B!SMRK Controls:

WASD - Camera Movement

Left Mouse - Build Stations

Right Mouse - Cancel Building

Mouse Wheel - Adjust Zoom

U - Open Upgrade Menu

B - Open Building Menu
